title: Berserk Deluxe Ed. Vol. 1
author: Kentaro Miura
blurb: A determined swordsman hunts demons in a fantasy world.

title: The Locked Room
author: Maj Sjöwall & Per Wahlöö
blurb: A man is found shot in a locked room while a spree of bank robberies occur.

title: Inspector Imanishi Investigates
author: Seichō Matsumoto
blurb: An investigation into the murder of a man in a trainyard quickly involves a new group of up-and-coming intellectuals and artists.

title: Berserk Deluxe Ed. Vol. 2
author: Kentaro Miura
blurb: A mercenary rises through the ranks.

title: Cop Killer
author: Maj Sjöwall & Per Wahlöö
blurb: Martin Beck's detective team investigates the disappearance of a woman as they become increasingly disillusioned with the police.

title: The Terrorists
author: Maj Sjöwall & Per Wahlöö
blurb: A terrorist attack occurs in Sweden, targeting a US politician.
